Class.example:
Setting the executionEngine entry's values in the remotion.web configuration section.
<remotion.web xmlns="http://www.re-motion.org/web/configuration"> <executionEngine defaultWxeHandler="~/WxeHandler.ashx" enableSessionManagement="true" functionTimeout="20" refreshInterval="10" urlMappingFile="C:\ProjectDirectory\UrlMapping.xml" /> <!-- Other configuration section entries. --> </remotion.web>
The values used for the defaultWxeHandler and urlMappingFile do not correspond to the default settings, which is undefined String.Empty).

EnableSessionManagement.remarks:
Session management relies on javascript and is fully supported by browsers other than
Internet Explorer 5.01+
Firefox 0.9+
Mozila 1.7+
Other browsers present no confirmation dialog upon leaving the page.
